Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.prog

Class WeightedCost

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.prog.WeightedCost
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProgressionCost
public class WeightedCost extends Object implements ProgressionCost
A weighted cost is a wrapper around a cost function that multiplies a cost by a fixed constant.
Author:
Stephen G. Ware
